skill.author: Ceeon

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill with no executable code. Contains only markdown documentation and templates for writing methodology. Zero security risks detected.

content.user_title: Create better content with structured writing workflow
content.value_statement: Content creators struggle with inconsistent quality and poor engagement. This skill provides a complete framework from topic selection to formatting with proven methodologies and checklists.
actual_capabilities: Guide topic selection using three-dimensional matching method
Structure outlines using sales funnel methodology
Write body text with cognitive science principles
Create engaging titles with numeric impact formulas
limitations: Requires manual input of user context and goals
Templates require customization for specific niches
No automatic content generation from keywords
Platform-specific formatting focuses on WeChat public accounts

use_cases.title: New article workflow
use_cases.description: Follow complete workflow from topic research to final formatting for new articles

use_cases.title: Quality assessment
use_cases.description: Use checklists to evaluate draft quality and identify improvement areas

use_cases.title: Content diagnosis
use_cases.description: Diagnose why published content underperforms using systematic analysis

prompt_templates.title: New article
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me write an article about [topic]. First, I will read user-personas.md to understand target audiences.

prompt_templates.title: Draft review
prompt_templates.prompt: Review my draft using the checklist in SKILL.md. Check each item and give me a score with improvement suggestions.

prompt_templates.title: Title creation
prompt_templates.prompt: Create 5 title options for my article about [topic] using the title methodology in methods/04-标题.md.

prompt_templates.title: Performance diagnosis
prompt_templates.prompt: My article about [topic] has low engagement. Use the checklist in SKILL.md to help me identify what went wrong.

output_examples.input: Help me write an article about using AI for productivity
output: Topic Assessment: Research first - search for existing content
Three dimensions: Define WHO, CONTEXT, and INFORMATION for this topic
User personas: Target beginners, professionals, managers
Outline: Start with why (3+ reasons to use AI)
Title options: Include 10x comparisons and dramatic words

best_practices: Always read user-personas.md first to understand target audiences
Use the checklist before publishing - aim for 80% or higher score
Apply term simplification to make content accessible to beginners
anti_patterns: Skipping the topic research phase leads to redundant content
Using technical jargon without explanation alienates readers
Publishing without title testing reduces click-through rates

faq.question: What platforms does this skill support?
faq.answer: Focuses on WeChat public accounts but principles apply to any content platform like Zhihu, Xiaohongshu, and blogs.

faq.question: How long does the complete workflow take?
faq.answer: Plan 1-2 hours for new articles including research. Draft review takes 15-30 minutes depending on length.

faq.question: Can I use this with other writing tools?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill provides methodology and structure. Combine with any editor or AI writing tool for content generation.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: This skill contains only markdown templates. No data is stored, transmitted, or accessed beyond your conversation.

faq.question: What if my draft scores below 60%?
faq.answer: Review the failing checklist items systematically. Common issues include missing why section, too few audience perspectives, and weak titles.

faq.question: How is this different from general writing AI?
faq.answer: Provides specific methodology with proven frameworks. Unlike general AI, it enforces quality standards through checklists and structured workflows.
